document.full_text: the big east's connecticut will play cincinnati in the round of 32, but with a record 11 teams in the n.c.a.a. tournament, an early clash between league teams was inevitable.
document.title: on basketball: in big east versus big east, success is on display
lines_and_colors: the big east's connecticut will play cincinnati in the round of 32, but with a record 11 teams in the n.c.a.a. tournament, an early clash between league teams was inevitable.
